GSD.product_version: versions from v4.4 to before v4.19.254
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix data-races around sysctl_tcp_recovery.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.254 by commit c7a492db1f7c37c758a66915908677bd8bc5d368, it was introduced in version v4.4 by commit 4f41b1c58a32537542f14c1150099131613a5e8a. For more details please see the references link.
